title: HORRORSHOW by David Darke
description:
HORRORSHOW
DAVID DARKE
ZEBRA BOOKS 1994

BEWARE. WHEN VOU TURN ON THE TV...
It was a Halloween the town of Twainton would never forget. First, the entire Gumm family brutally murdered in their home. Hours later, Druzeppa, the hypnoticof the local TV horror show, suddenly dying right on the air. Worst of all were the rumors...reports that Druzeppa was seen at the Gumm house shortly after their slaughter—and not long before his own spectacular demise.
...THE TV DOESN'T TURN ON VOU.
Now, twenty years later, it's Halloween again...a night of magic and mayhem...of demonic visions too terrifying for video, too evil for hell. Druzeppa has returned, live from the dead, to wreak his vengeance. As the whole town watches, a new, unsuspecting generation of viewers is whipped into a frenzy of depraved sex and unbridled bloodlust... without commercial interruption
